snippet.title: Sonic Colors Demastered - v0.4.0 Release Trailer
snippet.description:
#sonic  #soniccolors  #sage24
After months of tireless work, I'm excited to announce that version 0.4.0 of Sonic Colors Demastered is finally available! We will be officially exhibiting the game as a part of the Sonic Amateur Games Expo (SAGE) just like the last two years but managed to get the demo finished almost two weeks ahead of the event, which starts September 1st!

Enjoy blasting through five brand new stages as well as a host of bug fixes and smaller adjustments. Oh, did I mention your save data will carry over? If you played version 0.2.0 or 0.3.0, the game will automatically update your save file!

Check out the new demo at the links below. Happy gaming!

Links:
Game Jolt: https://gamejolt.com/games/sonic-colors-demastered/764823
itch.io: https://randomocity-gaming.itch.io/sonic-colors-demastered
